<COOLEDNODES><INFO sitename="Everything2" site="http://everything2.com" servertime="Thu Dec 6 03:30:06 2012">Rendered by the Cool Nodes XML Ticker</INFO> <cooled cooledby_user="Tem42" node_id="2098543" parent_e2node="2098510" author_user="Zephronias">November 30, 2012</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Tem42" node_id="1221983" parent_e2node="1221978" author_user="maiessa">Bank Holiday</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="StuartO)))" node_id="2098820" parent_e2node="2057818" author_user="moeyz">there must be something positive about this; I just can't think of it at the moment</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="BookReader" node_id="961358" parent_e2node="866437" author_user="Mike1024">Why the Borg have such terrible fashion sense</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="per ou" node_id="1193017" parent_e2node="1193005" author_user="kto9">Digna Ochoa</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="ebbixx" node_id="2098687" parent_e2node="2098686" author_user="Auspice">Pharmacology and the NOC</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="ignis_glaciesque" node_id="489381" parent_e2node="63877" author_user="ansate">Beer snob</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Hazelnut" node_id="1821781" parent_e2node="1821443" author_user="aneurin">Miners Strike of 1984-1985</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="decoy hunches" node_id="1026269" parent_e2node="973741" author_user="longwinter">I will wait until your quiet makes me remember I am waiting.</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="BookReader" node_id="2098814" parent_e2node="2098811" author_user="Glowing Fish">Kiss the Girl</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Jet-Poop" node_id="1007532" parent_e2node="557135" author_user="wertperch">Aeolian harp</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="etouffee" node_id="805995" parent_e2node="805953" author_user="Alpheus">Here in the brilliant sun we jostle</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Pandeism Fish" node_id="2098716" parent_e2node="2098715" author_user="Auspice">Angry Bear in the NOC</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Jet-Poop" node_id="2098473" parent_e2node="2098472" author_user="Auspice">The foxes of NOC and night</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Jet-Poop" node_id="2098447" parent_e2node="2098471" author_user="Zephronias">They will love him long after he is gone.</cooled>
</COOLEDNODES>
